00026 template <class InterfaceClass>
00027 class TFactorisableContainer: 
00028                      public ibase::TSerializableContainer<
00029                                           QPair<istd::TSmartPtr<InterfaceClass>, QByteArray> >
00030 {
00031 public:
00032        typedef QPair<istd::TSmartPtr<InterfaceClass>, QByteArray> ItemClass;
00033        typedef ibase::TSerializableContainer<ItemClass> BaseClass;
00034 
00035        TFactorisableContainer();
00036        virtual ~TFactorisableContainer();
00037 
00041        InterfaceClass* InsertElement(int index, const QByteArray& elementFactoryKey);
00042 
00046        InterfaceClass* AddElement(const QByteArray& elementFactoryKey);
00047 
00052        InterfaceClass* GetElement(int elementIndex) const;
00053 
00057        int GetElementIndex(const InterfaceClass& elementRef) const;
00058 
00062        QByteArray GetElementKey(int elementIndex) const;
00063 
00064        void RegisterItemFactory(istd::TIFactory<InterfaceClass>* itemFactoryPtr);
00065 
00066        // reimplemented (iser::ISerializable)
00067        bool Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive);
00068 
00069 protected:
00070        virtual InterfaceClass* CreateElement(const QByteArray& itemKey);
00071        virtual void OnElementCreated(InterfaceClass* elementPtr);
00072 
00073        // reimplemented (ibase::TContainer)
00074        virtual bool SerializeItem(ItemClass& item, iser::IArchive& archive);
00075 
00076 protected:
00077        istd::TIFactory<InterfaceClass>* m_itemFactoryPtr;
00078 };

00081 template <class InterfaceClass>
00082 TFactorisableContainer<InterfaceClass>::TFactorisableContainer()
00083 {
00084        m_itemFactoryPtr = NULL;
00085 }

00088 template <class InterfaceClass>
00089 TFactorisableContainer<InterfaceClass>::~TFactorisableContainer()
00090 {
00091        BaseClass::Reset();

00095 template <class InterfaceClass>
00096 InterfaceClass* TFactorisableContainer<InterfaceClass>::AddElement(const QByteArray& elementFactoryKey)
00097 {
00098        istd::TSmartPtr<InterfaceClass> elementPtr(CreateElement(elementFactoryKey));
00099        if (elementPtr.IsValid()){
00100               BaseClass::PushBack(ItemClass(elementPtr, elementFactoryKey));
00101        }
00102 
00103        return elementPtr.GetPtr();
00104 }
00105 
00106 
00107 template <class InterfaceClass>
00108 InterfaceClass* TFactorisableContainer<InterfaceClass>::InsertElement(int index, const QByteArray& elementFactoryKey)
00109 {
00110        istd::TSmartPtr<InterfaceClass> elementPtr(CreateElement(elementFactoryKey));
00111        if (elementPtr.IsValid()){
00112               BaseClass::InsertAt(ItemClass(elementPtr, elementFactoryKey), index);
00113        }
00114 
00115        return elementPtr.GetPtr();
00116 }

00119 template <class InterfaceClass>
00120 InterfaceClass* TFactorisableContainer<InterfaceClass>::GetElement(int elementIndex) const
00121 {
00122        if (elementIndex < BaseClass::GetItemsCount() && elementIndex >= 0){
00123               return const_cast<InterfaceClass*>(BaseClass::GetAt(elementIndex).first.GetPtr());
00124        }
00125 
00126        return NULL;
00127 }
00128 
00129 
00130 template <class InterfaceClass>
00131 int TFactorisableContainer<InterfaceClass>::GetElementIndex(const InterfaceClass& elementRef) const
00132 {
00133        for (int itemIndex = 0; itemIndex < BaseClass::GetItemsCount(); itemIndex++){
00134               InterfaceClass* elementPtr = GetElement(itemIndex);
00135               if (elementPtr == &elementRef){
00136                      return itemIndex;
00137               }
00138        }
00139 
00140        return -1;
00141 }

00144 template <class InterfaceClass>
00145 QByteArray TFactorisableContainer<InterfaceClass>::GetElementKey(int elementIndex) const
00146 {
00147        if (elementIndex < BaseClass::GetItemsCount() &&  elementIndex >= 0){
00148               return BaseClass::GetAt(elementIndex).second;
00149        }
00150 
00151        return QByteArray();
00152 }

00162 // reimplemented (iser::ISerializable)
00163 
00164 template <class InterfaceClass>
00165 bool TFactorisableContainer<InterfaceClass>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00166 {
00167        static iser::CArchiveTag itemsTag("Items", "List of items");
00168        static iser::CArchiveTag itemTag("Item", "Item");
00169 
00170        istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(archive.IsStoring()? NULL: this);
00171 
00172        if (!archive.IsStoring()){
00173               this->Reset();
00174        }
00175 
00176        int itemCount = BaseClass::GetItemsCount();
00177 
00178        bool retVal = archive.BeginMultiTag(itemsTag, itemTag, itemCount);
00179        if (!retVal){
00180               return false;
00181        }
00182 
00183        for (int index = 0; index < itemCount; index++){
00184               ItemClass item;
00185               QByteArray itemKey;
00186 
00187               if (archive.IsStoring()){
00188                      itemKey = BaseClass::GetAt(index).second;
00189               }
00190 
00191               static iser::CArchiveTag keyTag("ItemKey", "Factory key of the item");
00192 
00193               retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(keyTag);
00194               retVal = retVal && archive.Process(itemKey);
00195               retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(keyTag);
00196 
00197               if (!archive.IsStoring()){  
00198                      item.second = itemKey;
00199                      InterfaceClass* interfacePtr = CreateElement(itemKey);
00200                      if (interfacePtr != NULL){
00201                             item.first.SetPtr(interfacePtr);
00202 
00203                             BaseClass::PushBack(item);
00204                      }
00205                      else{
00206                             return false;
00207                      }
00208               }
00209 
00210               ItemClass& containerItem = BaseClass::GetAt(index);
00211 
00212               retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(itemTag);
00213               retVal = retVal && SerializeItem(containerItem, archive);
00214               retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(itemTag);
00215        }
00216 
00217        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(itemsTag);
00218 
00219        return retVal;
00220 }

00223 // protected methods
00224 
00225 template <class InterfaceClass>
00226 InterfaceClass* TFactorisableContainer<InterfaceClass>::CreateElement(const QByteArray& itemKey)
00227 {
00228        if (m_itemFactoryPtr != NULL){
00229               istd::IPolymorphic* polymorphicPtr = m_itemFactoryPtr->CreateInstance(itemKey);
00230               if (polymorphicPtr != NULL){
00231                      InterfaceClass* interfacePtr = dynamic_cast<InterfaceClass*>(polymorphicPtr);
00232                      if (interfacePtr != NULL){
00233                             OnElementCreated(interfacePtr);
00234 
00235                             return interfacePtr;
00236                      }
00237                      else{
00238                             delete polymorphicPtr;
00239                             
00240                             return NULL;
00241                      }
00242               }
00243        }
00244        
00245        return NULL;
00246 }

00250 void TFactorisableContainer<InterfaceClass>::OnElementCreated(InterfaceClass* /*elementPtr*/)
00251 {
00252 }

00255 // reimplemented (ibase::TContainer)
00256 
00257 template <class InterfaceClass>
00258 bool TFactorisableContainer<InterfaceClass>::SerializeItem(ItemClass& item, iser::IArchive& archive)
00259 {
00260        iser::ISerializable* serializablePtr = dynamic_cast<iser::ISerializable*>(item.first.GetPtr());
00261        if (serializablePtr != NULL){
00262               return serializablePtr->Serialize(archive);
00263        }
00264 
00265        return false;
00266 }
